title: Classification of Cotton T-Shirts
text: The product under consideration is a 100% cotton short-sleeve men's t-shirt. The ruling classifies it under HTSUS 6109.10.00.10 as 'T-shirts, singlets and other vests of cotton'.

title: Men's Polyester Shorts
text: The item is a pair of polyester athletic shorts. Based on material and function, it falls under HTSUS 6203.43.4010.

title: Electronic Fitness Tracker
text: The device is a wrist-worn fitness tracker with a heart rate sensor, classified under HTSUS 8517.62.0090.

title: Plastic Storage Containers
text: The subject merchandise is a set of molded plastic containers used for food storage. The correct classification is 3924.10.4000.

title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
text: This product is a vacuum-insulated stainless steel bottle. It is classified under HTSUS 9617.00.2000.

title: Leather Wallets
text: Leather billfold wallets are classified under HTSUS 4202.31.6000 as 'articles of a kind normally carried in the pocket or handbag'.

title: Wireless Earbuds
text: The wireless Bluetooth earbuds are classified under 8517.62.0090, as they are transmission and reception devices for voice and audio.

title: Menâ€™s Wool Suits
text: The item is a two-piece men's suit made of 100% wool. It is classified under HTSUS 6203.11.0010.

title: Electric Scooter
text: The item is a battery-powered electric scooter with a top speed of 25 km/h. It is classified under HTSUS 8711.60.0050.

title: LED Desk Lamp
text: This desk lamp uses integrated LED lighting and USB charging. Classification is HTSUS 9405.10.8010.
